book.title: What I Remember
book.description: 简介： I have no intention of writing an autobiography. There has been nothing in my life which could justify such a pretension. But I have lived a long time. I remember an aged porter at the monastery of the Sagro Eremo, above Camaldoli, who had taken brev...
